type.description: The type of the query to match against.

value.description: The query value to match against.

searchv1alpha2RecordQueryType.description:
Defines a list of supported record query types.

 - RECORD_QUERY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified query type.
 - RECORD_QUERY_TYPE_NAME: Query for an agent name.
 - RECORD_QUERY_TYPE_VERSION: Query for an agent version.
 - RECORD_QUERY_TYPE_SKILL_ID: Query for a skill ID.
 - RECORD_QUERY_TYPE_SKILL_NAME: Query for a skill name.
 - RECORD_QUERY_TYPE_LOCATOR: Query for a locator.
 - RECORD_QUERY_TYPE_EXTENSION: Query for an extension.

recordCid.description: The CID of the record that matches the search criteria.
